title: What is GSave Quick Save?
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Articles in this section

- [When will my new CIMB Grow interest rate take effect?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/43743585473433-When-will-my-new-CIMB-Grow-interest-rate-take-effect)
- [I want to upgrade to CIMB Grow but the app says I am not eligible. What do I have to do to become eligible?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/43743351197465-I-want-to-upgrade-to-CIMB-Grow-but-the-app-says-I-am-not-eligible-What-do-I-have-to-do-to-become-eligible)
- [Can I open a CIMB Grow account in GCash?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/43743085559193-Can-I-open-a-CIMB-Grow-account-in-GCash)
- [Can I open a GSave by CIMB account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30241337071769-Can-I-open-a-GSave-by-CIMB-account)
- [What is the interest rate in GSave by CIMB?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/12520304490905-What-is-the-interest-rate-in-GSave-by-CIMB)
- [How can I make a deposit to my GSave by CIMB account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360018680073-How-can-I-make-a-deposit-to-my-GSave-by-CIMB-account)
- [How can I withdraw from my GSave by CIMB account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30241685942425-How-can-I-withdraw-from-my-GSave-by-CIMB-account)
- [How can I update the mobile number linked to my GSave by CIMB account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/4416045289113-How-can-I-update-the-mobile-number-linked-to-my-GSave-by-CIMB-account)
- [What is GSave Quick Save?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/36430024948249-What-is-GSave-Quick-Save)
- [How can I close my GSave by CIMB account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30241781789721-How-can-I-close-my-GSave-by-CIMB-account)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

GSave Quick Save is a feature that lets GCash users view, access, and quickly deposit funds directly from the Savings dashboard, This feature is available only to GSave by CIMB as of writing. You can use this feature by following the steps below:

### **For users without a GSave by CIMB account:**

1. On your GCash app, tap your **Savings** dashboard
2. Click **Save Now**

_![](https://lh7-rt.googleusercontent.com/docsz/AD_4nXc8VVzlM8TGRPI1KPYdsie0rv5pvmNWhe8NN7DsXQtJJjsoyaC3PXGjKvCOI9tEHCbjGgFIQvsA6A330gwzzBQWRHwCRGkFvoybZ4XbC1hSaQpcpXJFeUJSqYIeeq7krwvtevITCQ04OoFjCo3rDSXq9FCA?key=NQl2kFDO9qZb2HWsuHg5zA)_

### **For users with a GSave by CIMB account:**

1. On your GCash app, tap your **Savings** dashboard
2. Click **Quick Save** \> **GSave by CIMB**
3. Deposit funds from your GCash wallet to your GSave by CIMB account

_![](https://lh7-rt.googleusercontent.com/docsz/AD_4nXePAwp9FqGymjp6cl3EEevQNAXsbtby09gMUwvEASczoIg6fyb39IJRKkwWhkAr_nwTWe-WodfeM0KPiNJjSMP9bZ7K8FaiUB2zHWAaUFBkb81glNXaHwrmfYrEA_lSY7uRD1_6gotcwRJkoDINfqItOKg?key=NQl2kFDO9qZb2HWsuHg5zA)_

If you’re having trouble viewing your balance, simply pull down the screen, tap the refresh button located in the balance bar, or restart your GCash app.

### **Need more Help?**

For other inquiries or concerns, check out the following articles:

- [How can I withdraw from my GSave by CIMB account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30241685942425)
- [How do I close my GSave by CIMB account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30241781789721)
- [I can’t open my GSave account. What do I do?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30244197882265)
